about.title: About Eager Plumbing LLC
about.description: At Eager Plumbing LLC, we are dedicated to providing top-notch plumbing services in Kerrville, TX, and the surrounding Hill Country region. With years of experience in both new construction and remodel plumbing, our mission is to ensure your plumbing needs are met with the utmost professionalism and care. Our team is committed to delivering quality service that you can trust, whether it's a minor repair or a major installation. We pride ourselves on our reliability, transparency, and customer satisfaction.

services.title: Our Plumbing Services
services.subtitle: Full-service plumbing solutions for your needs

items.title: Emergency Plumbing Repairs
items.description: We provide 24/7 emergency plumbing services to address any urgent issues. Our experienced plumbers are ready to tackle leaks, clogs, and more.

items.title: Water Heater Installation
items.description: Expert installation of all types of water heaters, ensuring you have reliable hot water when you need it.

items.title: Drain Cleaning Services
items.description: Professional drain cleaning services to prevent clogs and ensure smooth drainage in your home.

items.title: Plumbing Maintenance
items.description: Regular maintenance checks to keep your plumbing system in top condition and prevent costly repairs.

items.title: Full-Service Plumbing
items.description: We handle everything from new construction to remodel plumbing, ensuring all your needs are met.

items.title: 24/7 Availability
items.description: Our team is available around the clock to tackle any plumbing emergencies that arise.

items.title: Trusted Professionals
items.description: Our licensed and insured plumbers have extensive experience and a proven track record in the Hill Country.

items.title: Transparent Pricing
items.description: We provide upfront estimates with no hidden fees so you can trust what you pay for.

items.title: Community Focused
items.description: As a local business, we prioritize our community and deliver personalized service that sets us apart.

items.title: Customer Satisfaction
items.description: We strive for excellence in every job, ensuring our customers are not just satisfied but delighted with our work.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it - hear from our satisfied customers

items.reviewText: Eager plumbing is amazing! I called and they were able to install a new water heater at my home. The price and service can’t be beat. Very friendly and experienced staff! Will definitely use again...

Excellent experience from start to finish. The plumber was on time, polite, and clearly experienced. They explained everything clearly and got the job done. I felt confident in their work and will definitely use them again.
Well done replaced washer valves and fixed toilet tank gasket while here. Saving call out charges plus senior savings. Super qualified workers with an organized truck.
Guys were on time, fixed the problem very quickly. Very professional and friendly. I got a senior discount without even asking. Highly recommend this company.
The men arrived right on time. Very pleasant, polite and efficient. Got the job done quickly. Couldn’t ask for more! Thank you Eager Plumbing!
